name: map-marker-leaflet
description: The **Map Leaflet** Plugin is for [Grav CMS](http://github.com/getgrav/grav). Embed a map with markers using fontawesome icons or letters/numbers. Uses open source [Leaflet js library](https://leafletjs.com) with data from [OpenStreetMap](https://www.openstreetmap.org). [Extra-Marker Leaflet plugin](https://github.com/coryasilva/Leaflet.ExtraMarkers) is used for the markers. Enhanced map styling can be obtained from  [Thunderforest](https://www.thunderforest.com) or [MapBox](https://www.mapbox.com), but requires an api key (royalty free options are available).
